H0.text: What U.S. state borders four Great Lakes. US-IL

H1.text: What U.S. state borders four Great Lakes. US-OH

H2.text: What U.S. state borders four Great Lakes. US-MN

H3.text: What U.S. state borders four Great Lakes. US-MI

A4.text: Both the province of Ontario and the state of Michigan include in their boundaries portions of four of the lakes.
